title: RESOLUTION APPROVING THE SUPPLEMENTAL INVESTMENT PROGRAM (SIP) FOR SUPPLEMENTAL APPROPRIATION AMOUNTING TO FIFTY-NINE MILLION FIVE HUNDRED THREE THOUSAND NINE HUNDRED PESOS AND 71/100 (P 59,503,900.71) FOR GENERAL FUND PROPER; ONE MILLION FOUR HUNDRED FORTY-FIVE THOUSAND ONE FORTY-SIX PESOS AND 37/100 (P 1,445,146.37) FOR MARKET ENTERPRISE; AND ONE HUNDRED SEVENTY-TWO THOUSAND THREE HUNDRED FOURTEEN PESOS AND 91/100 (P 172,314.91) FOR SLAUGHTERHOUSE AND FOR THE REVERSION OF FUNDS FROM CAPITAL OUTLAY TO MAINTENANCE AND OTHER OPERATING EXPENSES AMOUNTING TO SIX MILLION PESOS (PHP 6,000,000.00) UNDER THE 2096 MUNICIPAL DEVELOPMENT FUND CY 2025 CURRENT APPROPRIATION.
